items.title: FPIs inflow in equities drops to Rs 7,320 cr in August on higher valuations
items.description: According to the data with the depositories, Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs) made a net investment of Rs 7,320 crore in Indian equities in August

items.title: Mcap of 8 of valued firms surge Rs 1.53 trn; Airtel, Infosys top gainers
items.description: The market valuation of Bharti Airtel soared Rs 47,194.86 crore to Rs 9,04,587.12 crore

items.title: Global trends, trading activity of FPIs key factors to drive mkt sentiments
items.description: The primary driver behind the bullish momentum in the domestic market is the growing anticipation of a rate cut in the United States and buying support from domestic investors

items.title: Sebi revises eligibility criteria for entry, exit of stocks in F&O segment
items.description: Stocks, which meet the eligibility criteria in the underlying cash market of any stock exchange, would be permitted to trade in the equity derivatives segment of all stock exchanges

items.title: RIL share to stay sideways amid no 'big bang' AGM announcements: Analysts
items.description: Reliance AGM: O Reliance Industries share price dipped 1.1 per cent to an intraday low of Rs 3,007 per share. It, eventually, ended 0.7 per cent lower at Rs 3,019.75 per share

items.title: UBS Group AG sells shares of 7 companies worth Rs 4,961 crore
items.description: Zurich-based UBS Group AG through its affiliate UBS Principal Capital Asia offloaded shares of seven companies through separate bulk deals on the National Stock Exchange (NSE)

items.title: Strong earnings growth ahead for listed sugar companies' stocks
items.description: The blend ratio targeted is 20 per cent (80 percent petrol with 20 per cent ethanol) for Nov '24-Oct '25, up from an estimated 14 per cent in Nov '23-Oct 24

items.title: Sebi removed 15,000 sites with unauthorised advice in three months
items.description: Speaking at the Global Fintech Fest, he said there was successful engagement with the technology providers who are complying with the regulator's request

items.title: Rakesh Gangwal, family trust sells 5.83% stake in IndiGo for Rs 10,500 cr
items.description: In two separate regulatory filings, Rakesh Gangwal sold 22.50 lakh shares of InterGlobe Aviation and the Chinkerpoo Family Trust disposed of more than 2.02 crore scrips of the airline

items.title: Market regulator Sebi plans to revamp the informal guidance framework
items.description: Additionally, Sebi has proposed to hike the application fee from Rs 25,000 at present to Rs 75,000

items.title: Sebi approves IIHL's acquisition of PMS business unit of Invesco AMC
items.description: The Competition Commission of India (CCI) has already granted its consent to IIHL for acquiring 60 per cent shareholding in each of InvescoAsset Management (India) Pvt Ltd and Invesco Trustee Pvt Ltd

items.title: Sebi's recovery rate remains below 2% of notices sent over a decade
items.description: The remaining recovery of 98.3 per cent has not been realised in practice. These notices cover collective investment schemes (CIS), deemed public issues (DPI), and other matters

items.title: Dividend fever hits 86 stocks! Gulf Oil others to trade ex-date next week
items.description: A dividend, often considered an additional source of income for investors upon their investment, is distributed by the company to its shareholders from its income

items.title: Stock Market Highlights, Aug 30: Benchmarks log record close; Sensex tops 82,350, Nifty near 25,250
items.description: Stock Market highlights: The Sensex, and Nifty50 ended at record high closing levels ahead of the Q1 FY25 GDP data to be released today

items.title: This PSU upstream oil stock has zoomed 209% thus far in calendar year 2024
items.description: Oil India shares have zoomed 209 per cent in the calendar year 2024, as compared to 14 per cent rise in the BSE Sensex.

items.title: Paytm surges 13% on heavy volumes; stock zooms 101% from May low
items.description: Paytm share price today: Paytm share has doubled, zooming 101 per cent, from its 52-week low of Rs 310, touched on May 9, 2024.

items.title: RVNL gets Rs 202-crore LoA from South Eastern Railway; shares gain over 4%
items.description: Rail Vikas Nigam Ltd will complete the project in an 18-month period

items.title: SBI Card loses credit card market share in July; InCred retains 'Reduce'
items.description: InCred's target price translates into 30.7 per cent downside in the share price from previous close of Rs 721.15 per share.
